content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synstg.blob.core.windows.net/syn-fs/delta/silver/Product/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
    where productID=680
order by ProductId;
